iati-activity.title: Recovery Framework in Dominica
iati-activity.description: Tropical Storm Erika produced intense rainfall causing flash flooding. As of August 30, 2015, twenty persons confirmed dead. The Government has also reported 574 persons are homeless, 300 evacuated and 267 in shelters.

document-link.title: Commonwealth of Dominica Rapid Damage and Needs Assessment Final Report Oct5
